ramp

private float ramp(java.lang.Integer pixelHouns,
                   java.lang.Integer houns1,
                   java.lang.Integer houns2,
                   java.lang.Double dens1,
                   java.lang.Double dens2)
Converts the pixel Hounsfield number to a mass density.

Parameters:
pixelHouns - Hounsfield number of pixel
houns1 - lower limit Hounsfield number of ramp
houns2 - upper limit Hounsfield numbre of ramp
dens1 - lower limit mass density of ramp
dens2 - upper limit mass density of ramp
Returns:
(pixelHouns - houns1) * (dens2 - dens1) / (houns2 - houns1)
